name: Good morning?
description: You wake up in a room. Your head is killing you and you’re not sure where you are...you look around and see you’re in a motel in the city.

name: Vital-supply drink
description: You have found a vital-supply drink. Enjoy this revitalizing beverage and top-off your stats.

name: Knife
description: On the counter is a knife... you grab it and open the door.

name: Sunglasses store
description: You enter a store. Here you can get weapons and health items. Weapons will help you when you encounter a combat situation. Health items increase your stats.

name: Rat
description: You encounter rats.  They start to attack you.  You must defend yourself!
